titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 194 (Roll no. 70).

bill.summary: 3/15/2005--Introduced. Requires the Speaker of the House of Representatives to appoint a bi-partisan task force with equal representation of the majority and minority parties to: (1) make recommendations to restore public confidence in the ethics process; and (2) report its findings and recommendations to the House by May 2, 2005.
